00022 /*
00023         Design Pattern Used: Chain of Responsibility
00024         Class: Dissector
00025         Handles Dissection of a packet at a level lower than TCP/UDP.
00026         Calls on the Cajun Parser that reads in an input file.
00027         Calls on Instruction objects to Interpret() a packet.
00028 */
00029 
00030 
00031 namespace BabelShark
00032 {
00033         class Dissector
00034         {
00035                 public:
00036             Dissector(const char* inFile, int* proto);
00037             ~Dissector();
00038 
00039             void Dissect(tvbuff_t *tvb, packet_info *pinfo, proto_tree *tree);
00040             void Test();
00041 
00042             void ReparseTree(const char* inFile);
00043 
00044                 private:
00045             void ParseInstructions(Instruction* in, tvbuff_t *tvb, proto_tree *tree, char* buffer, gint &offset);
00046             void ParseSet(Instruction* in, tvbuff_t *tvb, proto_tree *tree, char* buffer, gint &offset);
00047 
00048             Instruction* _RootInstruction;
00049             int*         _proto;
00050             gint**       _ett;
00051             std::string  _protoName;
00052             bool         _nameChanged;
00053         };
00054 }
00055 
00056 #endif //DISSECTOR_H
